label: kind/upgrade-considerations
impact/high
notes.text: Added cluster role permissions for other sources, including RBAC for HTTPProxy, CRD source deployment, and RBAC for dnsendpoints in the Helm chart.
Restored cluster role permissions to read services when Istio sources are enabled.
